### Getting Started
1. Read [CONTRIBUTOR_ONBOARDING.md](../../CONTRIBUTOR_ONBOARDING.md)
2. Set up dev environment: `npm install && npm test`
3. Create branch: `git checkout -b fix/issue-name`

- Related docs: [link]
- Similar PR: #[number]

### Mentorship Available
